attributes.action: Stop the planned highspeed rail link between London and the North
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A petition to stop the planned high speed rail link between London and Birmingham and the Birmingham and the north.
The rail link will destroy houses, ruin the countryside, de-value houses, kill wild-life and cost billions of pounds of tax payers money.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
